title: Someday
description: “IF YOU WANT TO DIE, SIT DOWN HERE.WE WILL KILL YOU.IF YOU DON’T WANT TO DIE, YOU WILL ENTER THE TRUCK.”Ruth and Gemma have a Physics exam in the morning.Becky and Alleluia are revising for their A Levels.So it’s an absolute nightmare to be woken by the fire alarm in dead of the night.But for them, and for 272 other girls from Chisbrook Hall girls boarding school, the real nightmare is just beginning.Because ‘al-Qabda’ are taking them all away.Whether they want to go or not.
author: Corinna Turner
